slogan.message: Update at the same time multiple anime sites just by watching on your favourite anime website.

firstRunMessage.message: Click on me to setup your anime lists!

stopDaemonMessage.message: If you need to watch some anime but without publishing it on your anime lists, you can go now!

startDaemonMessage.message: Scrobbly will resume scrobbling now, good session!

noactivity.message: Scrobbly doesn't detect anime activity. If you are watching anime but doesn't appear here, it might be because the website is not compatible with Scrobbly.

changeScrobblingFail.message: Sorry, something bad happened. It might be your input (only numbers!) or an internal problem.

badLoginTTD.message: Your credentials are wrong, double check and retry.

loginProcedure.message: Scrobbly needs a connection to an anime list service, when you have done, click Done to apply and start to use Scrobbly. If you relogin to a service, the old connection will be overwritten.

loginInfoAnilist.message: To login with AniList, you will be redirected to the AniList website to authorize the connection and setup Scrobbly automatically. The AniList website will give us an access token to your account, it will stay on your computer. To learn more, check the Scrobbly privacy policy.

loginInfoKitsu.message: To login with Kitsu, you need to type your account's e-mail and password (sidenote: login via Facebook is impossible for now). Your credentials are not stored on your computer and on our servers, they are just exchanged with an access token that are stored only on your computer. To learn more, check the Scrobbly privacy policy.

loginInfoTheTVDB.message: To login with TheTVDB, you need to type your username and your unique ID, if you ignore it, you can obtain it by going to TheTVDB "API Access" page. Your credentials are exchanged with a token that Scrobbly will use to get data directly on TheTVDB. To learn more, check the Scrobbly privacy policy.

youCanClose.message: Congrats! Your $SITE$ account is linked with Scrobbly. You can close this tab and go back to settings.

authIssueMessage.message: $SITE$ failed, please relogin in settings to reuse that website. If this issue is frequent, please contact me (@leonekmi).

dataProviderNotice.message: $SITE$ is a data source, Scrobbly doesn't affect the account data, these additional sources can be a fallback if anime lists services cannot provide some details, such as episode duration.

aboutText.message: Scrobbly is an extension created by a teenager alone in his room, it is open-source thanks to GPLv3 license. Everyone can contribute, ask modifications with the Git technology. Click on me for details.

starRepo.message: Please star my repo if you like this!

translateInfo.message: You can translate Scrobbly in other languages if you want to help the project. With that, you can help me to make Scrobbly available for more people.

patreonInfo.message: If you like Scrobbly, please consider to donate via Patreon if you want and you can, cool from you :).

githubInfo.message: Scrobbly is available on GitHub, you can open issues or pull requests if you want to contribute.

nativeText.message: a title in its native language

popupCustomization.message: I want these elements on the popup :

deleteModalMessage.message: Once unliked, your $SITE$ anime list will be not automatically updated with Scrobbly. You can relink your account at any time.
